results.title: Bone-Targeting Nanoparticles of a Dendritic (Aspartic acid)3-Functionalized PEG-PLGA Biopolymer Encapsulating Simvastatin for the Treatment of Osteoporosis in Rat Models
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) is a @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering drug that also promotes bone formation, but its high liver specificity may cause @DISEASE_Muscular_Atrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D009133 @@@muscle damage@@@, and the low solubility of lipophilic drugs limits the systemic administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@, especially in @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@OP@@@) studies.

results.title: Molecular Complex of HSIM-loaded Polymeric Nanoparticles: Potential Carriers in Osteoporosis.
results.text_hl: Thus, in order to distribute @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ subcutaneously for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@, the developed nanoparticles may act as a promising approach.

results.title: The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: To evaluate and compare the effects of the combined intervention of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and exercise on the @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone degeneration@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@OP@@@) induced by @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and @DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogen deficiency@@@.
